title: The Big trail (Captioned)
creator_credit: Raoul Walsh and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: The Big Trail covers the journey of hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out west. John Wayne as Breck Coleman leads them through the rugged terrain and falls in love on the way.
creator_credit_for_label: Raoul Walsh and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
